        <message>GlideRecordCounter seems to be a class that can be used to get the count of record. It is being used in some portal widgets and business rule

```javascript
var getCount = new GlideRecordCounter("incident");
getCount.addEncodedQuery("active=true");
getCount.query();
gs.print(getCount.getCount());
```
